name: IJFS Space Vacuum
description:
Controls for PC player: On-screen keyboard commands, arrowkeys are modifiers

Controls for VR player: The trackpad moves and rotates levers and dials, buttons can be pressed by moving the controller into them.

Green instructions are for the PC player, orange instructions are for the VR player.

Programming: Jonathan Montineri, Adrien Farhat
Art: Jonathan Montineri (modeling), Emmanuel Duplay (texturing and concept art)
